pages.text: Ginger Roots is a 'luxury' food item, only found in igloos and cold village houses (taiga and snowy). While you cant eat it, you can grind it into Ground Ginger in a crafting table. Using Ground Ginger, you can create Gingerbread.
Gingerbread is the core of the entire module. Using Gingerbread, you can create Gingerbread Bricks and Gingerbread Cookies. But it's not as simple as you might think...
To create Gingerbread Cookies, you first need to create a Cookie Cutter. The basic Cookie Cutter is a circular one, but you can shape your cutter in different shapes using the Stonecutter.
After you shape your cutter, simple use the recipe above with your cutter, to create beautiful Gingerbread Cookies!
